"A.P.238/4/8": "Hello, and to jump to the point, are you going to be attending the championship?"
"You're going right, right? When it doesn't matter because you don't have a choice anyways."
"Anyways, it looks like in order to participate you have to form a party."
"And here is another question, you haven't decided on a party yet right?"
"Because here's a super hint; the ARKS right in front of you is looking for someone too!"
"She must be talking about me, if you want to party, I'll gladly join."
"No no no no. It's no good if you run off with Tea and leave me by myself!"
"That's because Tea and I are a set, Patty&Tea!"
"So who was the one who was trying to ditch me?"
"I thought Huey was just joking when he said we could be fired, turns out that's not exactly the case."
"So basically we're looking to increase our chances of not getting laid off."
"If you invite us, we'll both come, so it might improve our ARKS Championship score."
"So be sure to invite us, or we'll put a curse on you."
"Don't worry about this idiot, just pair with us if you'd like to."
